title: Cappuccino of Cullen skink, peat smoked haddock
ingredients: ['2 leeks, chopped', '3 banana shallots, minced', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 pinch rosemary', '1 pinch thyme', '1 teaspoon Madras curry powder', '75ml white wine', '4 fillets of peat-smoked haddock', '400ml chicken stock', '600ml double cream', '100g butter', 'petit pois', 'chopped chervil and chives to taste', '6 poached quail eggs', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'dash truffle oil']
